title: Cake
description:
Cake provides an easy-to-use resume/CV builder for users who want to build highly customized resumes. By freely dragging and editing templates, users are able to create unique & eye-catching resumes in 10 minutes.
At the same time, we aim to transform Asia into a global hub for technology talents. By building an AI-powered talent search engine and talent matching system, Cake helps enterprises accelerate the recruitment process.
